name: iFruitBomb 2 - The Fruit Machine Simulator
description:
An in-depth 3D fruit machine simulator providing single or multiplayer gaming with online leader-boards (now with retina graphics for iPad/iPhone and iPod Touch).  
Features include:   Single player Tournament Mode: Play against computer controlled opponents in a timed race to cash out with the most winnings.
  Multi-player Credit Play and Tournament Mode: Supports play for up to 4 people on the same device.
Online leader-boards.
  Accelerometer assisted Reel view technology, allows you to sneak a peek under the reels by tilting your iPad/iPhone/iPod Touch. 
Zoom mode 3D graphics engine takes you straight to the action during gameplay.   
New features, aside from what you would usually find on a fruit machine such as nudges, skillstop's, bonuses, a feature trail and gamble play include:
Wheel based games: Depth Charge, Wheel of Mis-fortune and more.
Reel based games: Ocean Salvage, Fast Cruise, Shark Attack and more.
Video screen based games: Pirate Panic, Reef Races and more.
Skill based games: Deep Sea Gold, Squid's In, Missile Strike and more.
 Highscores registered for all game modes both online and locally (includes name entry and top 10 for local scoring).

The iFruitBomb 2 Instruction Manual can be downloaded as a PDF from the iFruitBomb 2 product page (under help and support) at www.idorweb.com
